title: Hanayome to Papa
overview: Uzaki Aiko a new 20-year-old daddy's girl works in the apparel company of her dreams. Her father, Kentaro, loves his daughter excessively to the point that he compels her to follow his house rules: 7:00pm curfew, no socialising with the opposite sex. Nevertheless, she falls in love with her colleague, played by Taguchi, and begins a mission to "graduate" from her father.
